title: Citi Private Bank Announces Partnership with Art13 London
summary: London - Citi Private Bank announced today it has signed an agreement to be the lead sponsor of Art13 London for an initial period of up to three years, underscoring the global scope of the Fair. The commercial details of this sponsorship are not being disclosed.
tag-1: Citi Private Bank Announces Partnership with Art13 London
tag-2: London – Citi Private Bank announced today it has signed an agreement to be the lead sponsor of Art13 London for an initial period of up to three years, underscoring the global scope of the Fair. The commercial details of this sponsorship are not being disclosed.
tag-3: Jane Fraser, CEO of Citi Private Bank, said, "We're pleased to confirm Citi Private Bank's sponsorship of Art13 London, the first truly global art fair. With offices around the world, Citi Private Bank shares Art13 London's international perspective. Art13 London will showcase some of the foremost names in contemporary art with a focus on art from growth markets, and we are confident it will offer galleries, artists, collectors and dealers from across the globe a platform in London."
tag-4: Luigi Pigorini, Europe, Middle East and Africa CEO of Citi Private Bank, said, "Citi Private Bank recognizes that the growth of the contemporary art market mirrors economic growth trends around the world. London is the global center of both finance and contemporary art, and we look forward to sponsoring such a ground breaking event that will offer unique insights and value to our clients."
tag-5: Suzanne Gyorgy, Global Head of Art Advisory & Finance for Citi Private Bank, said, "Citi was at the forefront in launching an art advisory service in 1979. Recognizing the increasing role of finance in the global art market, Citi Art Advisory offers discreet, bespoke advice and access to artists and insights into art world trends. We believe that art offers a vision into the future, and we are excited to partner with Art13 London in bringing new and emerging artists from around the world together in this new London art fair."
tag-6: The inaugural Art13 London Fair will take place at Olympia Grand Hall, London, March 1-3, 2013 (VIP Preview February 28, 2013). The Fair has been founded by Art Fairs London Ltd, the organizers behind the ground-breaking ART HK: Hong Kong International Art Fair, of which Art Basel acquired a majority stake in 2011. Featuring over 120 galleries from 30 countries, Art13 London will showcase art from across the world with a major presence from Asia, the Middle East and Africa as well as Western Europe and the Americas. The Fair's director is Stephanie Dieckvoss, who was Frieze Fair Manager for five years before co-directing ART HK for its first two years.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
